phrases: A Day at the Marui House
I think you would better stay home today.
You come home right away if you get any worse.
Boy, you are really working that aura today!
Man, Youngest-san's aura really sends shivers up your spine, huh?
Chiba, she is right behind you!
Probably just a ghost or something.
That would be all the more reason to turn around.
That cold's sucking the life out of her.
Let me write purification spells on her body!
Maybe I will go home instead.
Nipples only ever runs up to Youngest-san.
Can you not even see her without the aura?
We need to get them both to the nurse's office, now!
I just needed to sleep it off!
She is got a fever, they are sending her home.
Did your cold transfer to her?
If that cold made Futaba as weak as it did,
who knows how bad it will affect Youngest-san.
Probably so bad she will be able to curse us with a single glance!
That is one hell of a cold.
This is the cat you were talking about?
Tonight's the night we convince dad to let us keep it!
It said Meow, I want to live with the Maruis!
You bring a cat into this house
and there is a real chance it could get hurt.
I knew it would never happen.
Besides, the kitty even said, Meow, I want to live with the Maruis!
Well, if that is what the cat said I guess I have got no choice.
That stupid cat did not say a thing!
Why do I have to carry this stupid cat stuff...
You keep complaining but you are still helping.
I just happened to have some free time!
Even that cardboard box is gone.
I am sure a really nice, kind person picked it up.
See, one pet's more than enough for the Marui household!
Oh, it is saying please train me to be an obedient slave!
Do not just go back to normal, stupid!
Hey cut it out, you are making a mess.
Oh come on, you are ignoring me now?
You were my pet to begin with, you know!
Now for my ultimate trick, silvervine powder!
I win, she is my pet!
Aah, I picked it up by the river on the way home from work
but the cops took me in for questioning three times,
which is why I am late.
You two are really getting along today!
I do not want a pet like this!
Now you can battle monsters all by yourself!
The Serious Alloy Gachi Red analog model!
You are such a baby, Hitoha.
I am super nervous this week because
I am going around visiting parents at home.
A strong link between the home and school
environments is essential to a good education!
Of course, now I am on
my way to the biggest hurdle of my career, the Marui house...
I do not want to go I do not want to go I do not want to go!
You told him what time I was coming to visit, right?
I told him be back by 5 of the clock this morning.
If he is busy, he is busy,
but you could have at least told me when a good time would have been.
I am THIS close to getting really mad over here.
So where are Mitsuba-chan and Futaba-chan?
I am only going to wait ten more minutes!
You are going to impose on me for ten more minutes?
Do you mind if I watch television?
I have just one goal I want to achieve,
to be the best teacher you have ever seen!
Sometimes I will have to get strict with the student body,
but one day all the kids will look up to me!
Hold it, wait a sec Yabecchi,
you will never make it, not in a million years.
Micchan told everyone that lousy bum's my slave
and they all thought she was being sincere-
Why did she want me to be home by five, anyway?
You are such a sweet little thing...
Ooh, you are extra soft down here!
That is enough, hands off now, please.
Oh come on, I want to play some more.
That is enough, please do not touch me!
Aww come on, do not be shy...
I will murder you, you stinkin' scumbag pedo!
At least leave the cat to keep my company!
Something tells me that is not him...
Our room's the only one that is open.
All right, you stay hidden under the covers!
Do not worry, I will protect you.
I am trying to tell you, he is-
Forget it, I am scared too!
Oh, so you are their father!
Wow, I was sure you were a burglar!
Let us say I was...what is that make you?
He has not given me any trouble...
What happened at the triplet's place?
Actually, I think I have a pretty good idea.
Today's guest is the youngest of the Marui triplets...
Why do you always pop out from under my legs!
I do not want to disappoint.
Well I have got a weak heart, so knock it off!
You did not even try to help me in that last seg-
Today's guest is the youngest of the Marui triplets, Marui Hitoha-san.
What interesting topics will we talk about today?
Free tickets to the amusement park!
An all expenses paid trip to Hawaii!
I have never seen anyone win the grand prize!
Sometimes lady luck decides to side with you!
Please, my karma's so good this is totally normal.
No, no, I will not go if daddy's not coming too!
There is no weight limit so you will be okay, you pig.
T-The gondola will tip over, do not move a muscle...
Then again, she probably will not want to go anyway.
Amusement parks are for babies, like your panties.
I cannot wait to go with you, Micchan!
Or do you not want me?
Just do not go crazy, okay?
Wow, you won a lottery prize?
Tokyo Domeland has Gachi Rangers events every Saturday and Sunday.
You can meet the actors, get autographs, take pictures with them...
Wow, you sure know a lot.
I did a lot of research...
I have been wanting to go for a while...
I want to meet them too!
Well, I guess we can afford one more tick-
I have got plans with Sugisaki on Sunday!
Got To get a little face time with the servants every now and then, you know?
You two babies can have the tickets,
I did not even want to go in the first place.
Where are you and Sugi-chan going to go, Micchan?
Hey Micchan, those tickets you won...
This Sunday we are taking a day trip up to Hokkaido!
Why are you talking to Mitsuba, Futaba?!
You must be really excited, huh?!
Just so we are clear I am not getting you any souvenirs.
Yeah, just so we are clear I am not getting you any souvenirs!
Yeah, crab, potatoes, sea urchin, all that good stuff!
You are being a zillion times more annoying than usual!
So these tickets are enough for four people to get in!
Right, you, me, Micchan cannot come...
Hey Shin-chan, come with us to the amusement park this Sunday!
Whoa, where did that come from?
I mean it sounds cool and all...
